description: 6502 Fart B*mbs! is an implementation of Minesweeper as seen in MS Windows in the 90s.  Minesweeper was potentially inspired by Mined Out from 1983 for the ZX Spectrum.  6502 Fart B*mbs! has been ported from C64 to C128,VIC20,Plus/4,PET, and of course Command X16.
name: 6502 Fart B*mbs!
